meanings.definition: A musical composition or passage for one voice or instrument.
meanings.sent1: She sang a beautiful solo at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The violinist played a stunning solo during the orchestra performance.
meanings.sent3: The solo in the song was so lovely that it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared like a bird in the solo, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The solo echoed through the hall, leaving a lasting impression on all who listened.

meanings.definition: A performance or action done alone.
meanings.sent1: His dance solo was the highlight of the show.
meanings.sent2: She prefers to work on projects solo rather than in a group.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's solo attempt at climbing the tree was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His solo on the basketball court showed his true skills and determination.
meanings.sent5: The solo swim across the lake was a personal challenge she had always wanted to conquer.

meanings.definition: To perform or accomplish something alone.
meanings.sent1: He decided to solo the hiking trail for a sense of achievement.
meanings.sent2: She had to solo the presentation when her partner fell ill.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solo the massive project proved to be quite a daunting task.
meanings.sent4: He managed to solo the difficult task with sheer determination.
meanings.sent5: She aimed to solo the world record for the longest continuous piano playing.
